mapper.select: select jmm.job_no , jmm.tech_code , jmm.career_code , jmm.man_count , jmm.daily_wage , jmm.request_wage , jmm.comission_fee , jmm.pay_wage from job_manpower jmm where jmm.job_no = #{jobNo} and jmm.tech_code = #{techCode} and jmm.career_code = #{careerCode}
mapper.update: insert into job_manpower ( job_no , tech_code , career_code , man_count , daily_wage , request_wage , comission_fee , pay_wage ) values ( #{jobNo} , #{techCode} , #{careerCode} , replace(#{manCount},',','') , replace(#{dailyWage},',','') , replace(#{requestWage},',','') , replace(#{comissionFee},',','') , replace(#{payWage},',','') )
